lyrics.stanza: From the time I spoke Your name, Lord, my life's not been the same Since I called on the only One who'd save me. When forsaken, in despair— Who'd have thought that You'd be there! Now I've found out, Jesus, You're alive!
Now my eyes begin to see I'm living as I ought to be, As this turning, burning God moves in my heart... I don't care now how I feel; I just know that this is real, And I know, oh Jesus, You're alive!
It's no statue that I call, Not a picture on the wall, But a person who lives His life within me. Wish they'd told me long before, All You want's an open door And that really, Jesus, You're alive!
